abstract: Cisco has unveiled its biggest routing system to date, one that the company says is capable of linking everyone in China on a video call.
snippet: Cisco has unveiled its biggest routing system to date, one that the company says is capable of linking everyone in China on a video call.
lead_paragraph: 11:26 a.m. | Updated  Added comment from Juniper.

headline.main: Cisco Unveils One Router to Rule Them All
